name: Attention Wh*re
description:
Want more followers?

Then you better work bitch.

More followers=More impact, so upgrade your level whenever it's possible to gain even more followers.

And then gain more and more and more followers.

That's all you need to do.

You can also hack it going to the data file and changing it to have as many followers as you want, but  it's sort of cheating, right? Anyway, if you don't care, neither do I.

Followers always go up, never down, cause they're super loyal and also this was made for a class assignment and I ran out of time and will to make it.

The game ends when you want to end it.
